item.title: Fried Buldak
item.description: This recipe combines two of my favorite meals ever: fried chicken and Buldak, Korean fire chicken. It’s based on Serious Eat’s Buldak sauce and Quang Tran’s Sriracha Fried Chicken. This is the first recipe I (in part) created on my own that’s so good I’m confident enough to share it. ðŸ˜‰ If you like fried chicken and spicy food, you’re going to love this. Ingredients For one serving. Buldak sauce:

item.title: Cooking 101
item.description: This one’s for anyone just getting started with cooking. While I’m far from a master chef myself, I can in fact throw down a decently delicious dinner for a few guests. I realize that’s not too impressive in itself, but it’s far from where I was when I started college. Trust me. Back then the standards set by my cooking skills were so low that I was legitimately hyped when I treated myself to some McDonald’s takeaway for dinner.
